author: Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.
Vaughan, Robert, engraver.
publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Henry Seile, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Tygers-head in St. Paules Church-yard,
notes: "The tragicall historie of Piramus and Thisbe" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
With a final privilege leaf. Variant: this leaf blank.
The portrait (A1b) shows the curtain partly drawn and has signatures "B: Masters comp: Hen: Seile excu: Ro: Vaughan sculp." Variant: lacking the signature line, and with curtain completely down.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
